description.long: The LARQ Bottle PureVis™ is the world's first self-cleaning water bottle and water purification system. It uses PureVis technology to eliminate up to 99%* of bio-contaminants such as E. coli from your water and bottle.
description.short: *Based on elimination 99.8% of E.coli in a 20-second cycle for all LARQ Bottles.

faq.question: What's in the box?
faq.answer: LARQ Bottle PureVis™, USB to MicroUSB connector, Quick Start Guide

faq.question: How does the LARQ Bottle PureVis work?
faq.answer: The LARQ Bottle PureVis uses PureVis™ technology to clean your water and bottle at the touch of a button. The bottle intelligently turns on every 2 hours to clean the water you put inside as well as the inside of the bottle.

faq.question: Will the insulated LARQ Bottle PureVis keep the water cold?
faq.answer: Yes, the insulated bottle will keep cold water chilled for up to 24 hours.

faq.question: Does the LARQ Bottle PureVis have a warranty?
faq.answer: LARQ offers a 1-year limited warranty on all bottles purchased from www.livelarq.com and authorized retailers. The warranty covers the repair or replacement of any defective material or component. In the rare case that we are unable to repair or replace the defective material or component, we will submit a refund. It does not cover any issues due to normal wear and tear, misuse or loss/theft of the bottle.

faq.question: Where can i find the manual?
faq.answer: You will find manual in your box or you can download it here!

description.long: The LARQ Pitcher uses a unique 2-step process to improve the quality of your water using PureVis™ and Nano Zero filter technology–giving you fresh-tasting water sip after sip.

description.long: Sippers, chuggers, swiggers and ice-lovers—rejoice! The LARQ Bottle Swig Top was designed for easy hydrating on the go—simply snap open the cap!
description.short: As our first wide-mouth water bottle, we made sure to provide extra room for loading up with ice. Plus, double-wall insulation means that water stays cold for up to 24 hours. Aah—

description.long: The LARQ Bottle Flip Top features an easy-access straw so you can sip your hydration goals down with ease. It’s double-wall vacuum insulated to keep water cold for up to 24 hours and the silicone-coated detachable carabiner makes on-the-go hydration that much easier.

description.long: The LARQ Bottle Twist Top features double-wall vacuum insulation to keep water cold for up to 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. Powder-coated in two-toned colors, the LARQ Bottle Twist Top is perfect for the office, a weekend snow trip, and staying hydrated wherever your adventures take you.
description.short: Note: The LARQ Bottle does not feature our built-in PureVis™ technology. Learn more about our LARQ Bottle with PureVis™ technology for on-the-go water purification here.
